name: @todesktop/recall
description: ToDesktop plugin for Recall.ai Desktop Recording SDK integration

scripts.build: npm run sync && rollup -c && npm run generate-types --workspace=packages/plugin && npm run copy-types --workspace=packages/client
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --workspaces --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run release:patch -ws && npm version patch --force
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run release:minor -ws && npm version minor --force
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run release:major -ws && npm version major --force

author: ToDesktop
